xdi2.core

Interface GraphFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraphFactory, AbstractJSONGraphFactory, AbstractKeyValueGraphFactory, BDBJSONGraphFactory, BDBKeyValueGraphFactory, ClasspathWrapperGraphFactory, FileJSONGraphFactory, FileWrapperGraphFactory, MapKeyValueGraphFactory, MemoryGraphFactory, MemoryJSONGraphFactory, PropertiesKeyValueGraphFactory, URLWrapperGraphFactory, WrappedGraphFactory

    public interface GraphFactory
    A graph factory can construct new XDI graph implementations.
    Author:
    markus
